segments.text: Hello . Are you a friend of Helen's ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , a friend of a friend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My name is Phil . What's yours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you tried these little ditties ? They are really good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I get you some punch ? I was just going to go get myself some .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be great . I would love some .
segments.speaker: S2
